title: Ep 158 | Jase's Gas-Pump Gripe, Marrying 'White Trash' Robertsons & Excuses for Not Coming to Jesus
description:
Phil and Jase talk about taking Jesus for granted, and that reminds Jase that he has a major bone to pick with the people who set up gas pumps. Al remembers trying to drive to his wedding with kerosene in the tank and decides maybe there's a reason no one wanted their daughters marrying the Robertson boys. And Phil, Jase, and Al talk about John 14, the reasons people give for not coming to Jesus, and the beginning of forever. But first, the guys weigh in on how LSU is doing this year, and Al and Jase preview their upcoming book projects.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
